General.Name: NanoCMS Co. Ltd.
General.Description: NANOCMS Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of electronic nano materials in South Korea. The company offers security materials, including UVA and UVC visible fluorophores, and UVA and UVC visible bi-fluorescent fluorophores for applications in the anti-counterfeiting and anti-forgery; organic and inorganic NIR(near-infrared) absorbing pigments for banknote, passport, ID-card, etc., as well as for brand protection, ticketing, voucher, official certificates, and the other security printings; and IR emitting materials to print and to authenticate high security documents, as well as to authenticate industrial and electronics products, monopolies, pharmaceuticals, foods and cosmetics, etc. It also offers nano-coating material for use in high reflective reflector for solar thermal power plant, silver thin film and electro-magnetic interference parts, and reflector manufacturing; and high purity nano silica sol and hard coating material for use in the hardness of electronic products and display films. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Cheonan, South Korea.
